channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: String of potholes/ possible failed repair. Potholes have been growing steadily worse, 25th July
item.description:
On corner near Dry Meadow Lane.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Innsworth Lane, Innsworth, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 25th July
item.description:
FMS report fwd by CBC 24.07.25 - Trees in front of bungalow have become a thicket which is invading my garden. truggling to cut back the thicket which is growing through my wire railings. A tree branch has grown across my land and is getting close to the roof. Originally there were two Holly trees but rowan trees grew in the middle of them followed by brambles. Seventeen years on it is a massive thicket which is completely out of control. It needs removing.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface problem, 25th July
item.description:

item.title: Blocked drain, 25th July
item.description:
The drain is located in the parking bay opposite the newly refurbished toilet block of Montpellier Gardens. As you can clearly see the soil debris is solid and completely blocking the drain and it's function. I believe I reported this issue almost a year ago and still it hasn't been addressed. When it rains the water is unable to drain away and creates unsafe pavement conditions due to the fact the rain water flows over the pavement creating a hazard for pedestrians.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
